name: AWS IoT Things Graph
short: A service in AWS that enables developers to visually connect different devices and web services to build IoT applications.
description: AWS IoT Things Graph is a service that simplifies the integration and interaction of different devices and web services. It provides a visual interface for creating IoT applications, allowing users to connect devices and services using pre-built models. It supports a variety of standard protocols, enabling seamless communication between diverse IoT devices. The service increases the efficiency of application development, enables device interaction automation, and accelerates IoT application deployment.
